headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://www.googletagmanager.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com; font-src https://fonts.gstatic.com; img-src 'self' data: https://www.googletagmanager.com; connect-src https://script.google.com https://script.googleusercontent.com https://www.google-analytics.com https://analytics.google.com https://*.google-analytics.com https://*.analytics.google.com;
